thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo's stunning girlfriend watches him in action as reports suggest he will welcome TWINS into family
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo's stunning girlfriend watches him in action as reports suggest he will welcome TWINS into family

author: Marc Isaacs
title: Cristiano Ronaldo's stunning girlfriend watches him in action as reports suggest he will welcome TWINS into family
text:
Sport Cristiano Ronaldo's stunning girlfriend watches him in action as reports suggest he will welcome TWINS into family Ronaldo is reported to be using an American surrogate who will give birth to the two boys and is keen for Cristiano Jr to have brothers to grow up with Share Ronaldo's girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez will have a busy household to deal with (Photo: MEGA) Share Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Cristiano Ronaldo's stunning girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez watched the Real Madrid superstar in action as news emerged that he is set to become a father again to twin boys. 
Rodriguez appears to be a lucky charm after she saw Ronaldo steal the headlines once again when he surpassed Atletico Bilbao's Aritz Aduriz to score the most-headed goals in La Liga. 
The goal came on 41 minutes as Madrid beat Real Betis 2-1 at the Bernabeu and took Ronaldo's tally to 46 headed goals - more than any other player in the competition. Ronaldo has plenty of reason to celebrate (Photo: REUTERS) 
This is certainly a busy time for the former Manchester United forward after reports suggested he is using an American surrogate who is due to give birth to the two boys in the near future. 
Ronaldo is currently dating 23-year-old Rodriguez who welcomed son Cristiano Jr back in 2010 - also believed to be via surrogacy. Rodriguez was at the Bernabeu to watch Ronaldo in action on Sunday night (Photo: MEGA) Ronaldo scored the equaliser for Real Madrid to create a new record (Photo: Getty) 
The Sun is claiming that someone close to the Madrid star will fly the two boys to his Spanish home when they are born. 
A source said: “He feels the time is right for his boy to have brothers to grow up with. His mum Dolores will be there to lend a helping hand like she has been with little Cristiano.” 
Ronaldo is keen to share pictures of his son on social media, but the identity of his mother has always remained a secret. Ronaldo loves spending time with Cristiano Ronaldo Jnr (Photo: Barcroft) 
The 32-year-old has spoken about his son growing up without a mum when he appeared on the Jonathan Ross show. 
He said: "For me it is not a problem. I will say in the world, many kids don't have mum, don’t have dads or dads die or mums die... Cristiano has a dad, an unbelievable dad. Cristiano Jnr spending time with Ronaldo's mumr Dolores (Photo: Getty) 
"[He has] a grandmother, I have the support of my family, great of course. It will be like, ‘why don’t you [say?]’ Listen, some points in life it’s private and people have to respect the privacy of other people. 
"When Cristiano is going to grow up, I am always always going to say the truth to him because he deserves, because he is my son but I am not going to say because people want me to say." poll loading Will Cristiano Ronaldo win the FIFA Player of the Year award? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
